cab.content: Mk^TrEHAUijKutary Secret. Fro??i Viceroy, Army Department. 29th June 1917. ....... (Received 30th, TO a.m.) ... 9628. Mahsud operations. Force rested on 26th and 27th, camp beingunmolested except for isolated snipers on 27th. Aeroplane raids carried outagainst Makin and Marchi; considerable damage reported done in j\iakin.Health of troops continues satisfactory. . .
